meanings.definition: A fabric with a puckered or pleated surface.
meanings.sent1: The dress was made of delicate plisse fabric.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate plisse pattern on the skirt.
meanings.sent3: The plisse material felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent4: The plisse design added texture to the garment.
meanings.sent5: The plisse fabric shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To create a puckered or pleated surface in fabric.
meanings.sent1: She carefully plisse-d the edges of the tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: The tailor plisse-s the fabric to give it a unique look.
meanings.sent3: He plisse-d the curtains to give them a stylish twist.
meanings.sent4: The artist plisse-d the canvas to add depth to the painting.
meanings.sent5: Plisse-ing the fabric requires precision and skill.
